Episodes.Title: EST Men
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Joel Fields, Lara Shapiro
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Tensions simmer between Philip and Elizabeth as they disagree over handling orders from the Centre. When Elizabeth loses key intel, Philip enlists Annelise on a mission with an unexpected outcome.

Episodes.Title: Baggage
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Joel Fields, Lara Shapiro
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Elizabeth and Philip come together to deal with a mission gone wrong, but struggle to reconcile their ideologies; Stan welcomes a Soviet defector to America; Nina acclimates to her new living arrangements.

Episodes.Title: Open House
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Stuart Zicherman, Lara Shapiro
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Danger mounts for Elizabeth and Philip as they get closer to the inner circle of the CIA Afghan Group.

Episodes.Title: Dimebag
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Peter Ackerman, Lara Shapiro
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Philip faces a moral dilemma while developing an asset. Philip and Elizabeth's friction escalates. Stan develops a theory with serious reprecussions for national security. Paige makes a surprising birthday wish.

Episodes.Title: Salang Pass
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Stephen Schiff, Lara Shapiro
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Philip juggles the many women in his life while Elizabeth takes drastic measures to complete a mission. Stan asserts a plan to save Nina with an unlikely ally.

Episodes.Title: Born Again
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Tracey Scott Wilson, Lara Shapiro
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Gabriel has surprising information; Elizabeth begins to take family matters into her own hands.

Episodes.Title: Walter Taffet
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth feel the weight of a family secret while following up on the KGB's interests.

Episodes.Title: Divestment
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Martha and Clark's marriage meets its most challenging test yet; pressure on Philip intensifies.

Episodes.Title: Do Mail Robots Dream of Electric Sheep?
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth struggle with the gravity of unexpected collateral damage.

Episodes.Title: Stingers
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth deploy a plan for the C.I.A.'s Mujahideen visitors.

Episodes.Title: One Day in the Life of Anton Baklanov
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Stephen Schiff, Tracey Scott Wilson
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Philip and Elizabeth's home and work lives collide in new and dangerous ways. Nina struggles to figure out her next steps. Arkady assigns Oleg and Tatiana to an operation with uncertain potential.

Episodes.Title: I Am Abassin Zadran
Episodes.Writer: Joseph Weisberg, Peter Ackerman, Stuart Zicherman
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Martha hosts an unexpected guest; Philip and Elizabeth must work a formidable Mujahideen commander.

Episodes.Title: March 8, 1983
Episodes.Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Lev Gorn
Episodes.Plot: Elizabeth and Paige take a trip that lands them in treacherous territory.
